name: ResourceDescriptionDirectoryEntry

contact.name: Visit the Github repository for more information

description:
A
				DirectoryEntry that identifies the elements of a resource description that appear in every directory of resources of a particular type. ResourceDescriptionDirectoryEntry is an abstract type and is realized in
				the implementing subtypes listed in CTS2ResourceType

element.definition:
A
				DirectoryEntry that identifies the elements of a resource description that appear in every directory of resources of a particular type. ResourceDescriptionDirectoryEntry is an abstract type and is realized in
				the implementing subtypes listed in CTS2ResourceType

element.name: about
element.short: the (or a) definitive URI that represents the resource being described
element.definition: the (or a) definitive URI that represents the resource being described.

element.name: formalName
element.short: the formal or officially assigned name of this resource
element.definition: the formal or officially assigned name of this resource

element.name: resourceSynopsis
element.short: a textual summary of the resource - what it is, what it is for, etc
element.definition: a textual summary of the resource - what it is, what it is for, etc.
